arlut.csd.JDataComponent
Class JchoiceList

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              arlut.csd.JDataComponent.JchoiceList
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class JchoiceList
extends java.awt.Panel

JchoiceList This class is basically a java.awt.List object with some added functionality. When the user makes a selection, a callback is made to send the string representation of that selection to whatever component in attached to the JchoiceList.

See Also:
Serialized Form
